description: Creates a subscription request in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the subscription request is created.

parameters.name: metadataForms
parameters.description: The metadata form included in the subscription request. (dict) --- The details of a metadata form. content (string) --- The content of the metadata form. The name of the metadata form. typeIdentifier (string) --- The ID of the metadata form type. typeRevision (string) --- The revision of the metadata form type.

nested_params.name: content
nested_params.description: The content of the metadata form.

nested_params.name: formName
nested_params.description: The name of the metadata form.

nested_params.name: typeIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ID of the metadata form type.

nested_params.name: typeRevision
nested_params.description: The revision of the metadata form type.

parameters.name: requestReason
parameters.description: The reason for the subscription request.

parameters.name: subscribedListings
parameters.description: The published asset for which the subscription grant is to be created. (dict) --- The published asset for which the subscription grant is to be created. The identifier of the published asset for which the subscription grant is to be created.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the published asset for which the subscription grant is to be created.

parameters.name: subscribedPrincipals
parameters.description: The Amazon DataZone principals for whom the subscription request is created. (dict) --- The principal that is to be given a subscriptiong grant. project (dict) --- The project that is to be given a subscription grant. identifier (string) --- The identifier of the project that is to be given a subscription grant.

nested_params.name: project
nested_params.description: The project that is to be given a subscription grant.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the project that is to be given a subscription grant.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when the subscription request is created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the subscription request.

nested_items.name: decisionComment
nested_items.description: The decision comment of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in whcih the subscription request is created.

nested_items.name: existingSubscriptionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the existing subscription.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: metadataForms
nested_items.description: The metadata form included in the subscription request.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: formName
nested_items.description: The name of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The name of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: requestReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the subscription request.

nested_items.name: reviewerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the reviewer of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: subscribedListings
nested_items.description: The published asset for which the subscription grant is to be created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: assetListing
nested_items.description: The asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: assetScope
nested_items.description: The asset scope of the subscribed asset listing.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The asset ID of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: filterIds
nested_items.description: The filter IDs of the asset scope.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: entityRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: forms
nested_items.description: The forms attached to the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: glossaryTerms
nested_items.description: The glossary terms attached to the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: shortDescription
nested_items.description: The shoft description of a glossary term attached to the inventory asset.

nested_items.name: productListing
nested_items.description: The data product listing.

nested_items.name: assetListings
nested_items.description: The data assets of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The entity ID of the listing of the asset in a data product.

nested_items.name: entityRevision
nested_items.description: The entity revision of the listing of the asset in a data product.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The entity type of the listing of the asset in a data product.

nested_items.description: The description of the data product listing.

nested_items.description: The ID of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the data product listing.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: ownerProjectId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the project of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: ownerProjectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project that owns the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: subscribedPrincipals
nested_items.description: The subscribed principals of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the project that has the subscription grant.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the project that has the subscription grant.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the subscription request was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who updated the subscription request.
